name: Tighnari
title: "Verdant Strider" Tighnari
desc: From a certain perspective, experience does not hold parity with wisdom.

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Tighnari to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with him

skills.name: Vijnana-Phala Mine
skills.desc: Deals 2 <span style="color:#7EC236FF">Dendro DMG. This character gains <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Vijnana Suffusion.

skills.name: Fashioner's Tanglevine Shaft
skills.desc: Deals 4 <span style="color:#7EC236FF">Dendro DMG, deals 1 <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF"><span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Piercing DMG to all opposing characters on standby.
